File libsrc/libgmethod/Copy.c

Public Function Index

new_Copy (double, double)
Create a Copy object.
Copy_addMethod ()
Register the Copy as a readable GMethod.

Public Functions

new_Copy 
 Copy new_Copy(double begSelect,
               double endSelect)
Create a Copy object. Copy is a GMethod object that copies all or part of a waveform.

Parameters:
begSelect - The beginning epochal time of the copy.
endSelect - The ending epochal time of the copy.
Returns:
a Copy object, or NULL if malloc fails (logErrorMsg will be called)
Copy_addMethod 
 void Copy_addMethod()
Register the Copy as a readable GMethod. This routine should be called once before a Copy is read from a file.
